column4: メリッサ＿戦闘中電話機で通話

大変だよ。
オートマンがアーストンに
向かってる。
column5:
We've got an emergency!
Automen are heading towards Aston.
column11:
We have an emergency.
Automen are heading towards Aston.

column4: すぐに応援に行かないと。
column5: We need to go assist them immediately.
column11: We need to go and assist them immediately.

column4:
みて！
オートマンが
何か機械を設置してる。
column5:
Look!
The Automen are installing some kind of machine!
column11:
Look!
The Automen are installing some kind of machine.

column4:
小型オートマンの
コントロール装置だ！
column5: That's a control device for the small Automen!
column11: That's a control device for the small Automen!

column4:
このままだと、
また小型の飛行オートマンが
来るよ。
column5: At this rate, those little flying Automen are going to appear again.
column11: At this rate, those small flying Automen are going to appear again.

column4: 今のうちに破壊しないと。
column5: We've got to destroy it now, while we have the chance.
column11: We've got to destroy it now, whilst we have the chance.

column4: アーストンには私がいる。
オートマンの好きにはさせない。
column5: I won't let the Automen do as they please.
column11: I won't let the Automen do as they please.

column4:
私がオートマンを攻撃します。
/pさんは、あの機械を
攻撃してください。
column5:
I'll hold off the Automen.
/p, please target that device.
column11:
I'll hold off the Automen.
/p, please target that device.

column4:
エリーたち。
無事だといいけど。
column5: I hope Ellie and them are safe.
column11: I hope that Ellie and them lot are safe.
